mapper.insert: insert into constanttype (id, ConstantTypeCode, ConstantTypeName, DelMark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{constanttypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{constanttypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delmark,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, ConstantTypeCode, ConstantTypeName, DelMark from constanttype
